column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I love to eat sweets , and on a day like today , I really could use a piece of cake .
#id=2
#text=However , I was not sure that I would not have the ingredients necessary to bake a cake , plus , the kids are home , and I would have to include them in the activity .
#id=3
#text=However , I decided to make baking a cake a family activity , and hope we could have some fun doing so .
#id=4
#text=I quickly looked in the cupboards , and realized that I had enough ingredients to bake the cake .
#id=5
#text=I got the mixing bowls , and the kids helped with the cracking of the eggs , and the mixing .
#id=6
#text=I knew the anticipation of the cake was heavy on their minds , as it had been a while since I baked a cake .
#id=7
#text=Once the mixing was done , I turn the oven on to preheat , and moved the kids to the island for safety .
#id=8
#text=They took turns pouring the cake batter into the pan , and then I placed the cake into the oven .
#id=9
#text=The hard part is now waiting , and I hate to wait , however , this cake was worth waiting for .
#text=As a treat , I allowed the kids to eat a tiny piece of the cake , as a thank you gesture for all their help .
